oMeta.subtitle: Addressed to the Inhabitants of America
oMeta.description: In its time over 600,000 copies of "Common Sense" were circulated through the Colonies. Not one to be politically correct, Thomas Paine and his thoughts were key to starting a revolution.

searchInfo.textSnippet: In its time over 600,000 copies of "Common Sense" were circulated through the Colonies. Not one to be politically correct, Thomas Paine and his thoughts were key to starting a revolution.

oMeta.title: Common Sense
